Name: Ledger immutability
Objective: Ensure ledger entries are tamper-evident and anchored.
Covered by policies: fail_types: RECEIPT_INTEGRITY_MISMATCH, RECEIPT_MISSING_FOR_CONFIRMED, ANCHOR_FAILED; fail_severity: critical; require_pack_signature
Covered by checks: Hash chain, Anchoring status (STRICT), Pack signature

Name: Anchoring status
Objective: Require anchoring assessment status OK (no FAIL).
